DOC.brief_summary: To determine objective response oxaliplatin/5FU/leucovorin combination chemotherapy patient advance unresectable metastatic gastric cancer .
DOC.criteria: ECOG performance status 02 . Histologically proven gastric gastroesophageal junction adenocarcinoma . At least unidimensional measurable disease . If unique metastasis constitutes disease sign , require histological confirmation . First line locally unresectable metastatic gastric cancer . Relapsing gastric cancer local and/or systemic treatment postsurgical period least 4 week , postadjuvant neoadjuvant chemoradiotherapy period least 6 month . Serum bilirubin < 2 mg/dl Serum creatinine < = 2 mg/dl Hemoglobin > = 10 g/dl Absolute neutrophil count > = 2000/dl Platelet count > = 100 , 000/dl AST/ALT < = 2.5 timefold institutional normal upper limit Alkaline phosphatase < = 5 timefold institutional normal upper limit Imagenological evaluation patient least 2 week prior drug infusion Laboratory test least 1 week prior first infusion Patient available follow able answer quality life questionnaire Symptomatic sensorial peripheral neuropathy Uncontrolled concomitant disease Another malignant neoplastic disease diagnose within previous 5 year diagnosis advance metastatic gastric cancer , exception 'in situ ' cervix carcinoma nonmelanoma skin cancer Concomitant antitumoral treatment Cerebral metastases Unstable heart disease , even though treatment Myocardial infarction within last 6 month Radiotherapy within last 6 week , surgery within last 4 week , chemotherapy within last 6 month . Pregnancy nursing ( woman reproductive life without adequate contraception ) Significant neurological psychiatric disorder .
